mapper.update:
update t_login
`User` = #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AccessToken = #{accessToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
RefreshToken = #{refreshToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
`State` = #{state,jdbcType=OTHER},
AccessTime = #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RefreshTime = #{refreshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Device = #{device,jdbcType=OTHER},
QueueListener = #{queueListener,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_login set `User` = #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AccessToken = #{accessToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RefreshToken = #{refreshToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, `State` = #{state,jdbcType=OTHER}, AccessTime = #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RefreshTime = #{refreshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Device = #{device,jdbcType=OTHER}, QueueListener = #{queueListener,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_login set AccessToken = '', RefreshToken = '', `State` = 'logout'
`User` = #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Device = #{device,jdbcType=OTHER}
